channel.title: ˙·٠•● ™GrinderScape 24/7™ ●•٠·˙ - Pk Point,Quest's,VPS,Bosses,Dupe Fixed,Customs
channel.description:
I Have Created This Server And Started Server Development Im Working On It Daily It Has Alot Of Features And Soon Ill Be Releasing It :D [b]Welcome To GrinderScape.[/b] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/rj0gae.jpg[/img]
---------------------------------------------- [b]Sounds System On Attacking+Citys!!!!!!![/b] -Godwars. Weapons Special Effects: White Whip=Chance On Spec 60% Teleblocks!! Unknown Whip=Chance On Spec 85% Ectangles For 15 Sec Gold Whip=Chance On Spec 90% Hits On Prayer Ice Whip=Chance On Spec 70% Removes Protect 1 Item Features -Huge Updates -Alot Of Npcs -Working Spirit Shields -All GodSword Specails With Real Gfx -Good Starter -Pk Points Shops With Customs -Many Players -Working D Claws With 4 Hit Special Attack -Pk Events -Working Assualt -1k Exp Hit Rate -Dedicated Server -No Lag 24/7 -Weapons Specail Effects -Max Lvl 138 Slayer Gives Combat -Working New Jad -Max Stat 99 -Stable Enconomy -New Custom Shops Added -180 Custom Items With Bonuses+Specials+Effects -Added Dragon GodSword With Spec -Working Slayer With Tasks -7 MiniGames -Clue Scrolls works 100% -Working Wildy Levels -8 Quests To Do -84 Custom Npcs To train on -Working Prayers 100% -Deul Arena -New Pk Area -All Skills Working -Mods+area -Working Protect 1 Item -Added Lunar -Working Pest Control -Donation System -15000+ Working Items -Customs Sets -100% Dupe Fixed -Sounds In Areas!!!!!! [b]-Medium Training,Money Making[/b] -100% Working Special Attacks (All Weapons) -Alot Of Custom Items -Events (pk,holidays..) -Pest Control 100% -Pk Points Shops With Customs -12 Quests -380+ Npcs To Train On -9 Mingames -12 BOSSES -100% Deul Arena (staking) -All Skills Working -Mods Area -100% Clan Chat -Fully Working Dragon Bolts (e) With Effects [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/33nhojc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1pxrf9.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/255ulfq.gif[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/lchar.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/n6f41w.gif[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/20gdwns.gif[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2w5tu2h.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mfd7w2.gif[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/25yzsi8.gif[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/208k8r7.gif[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2pq6d1v.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/o5pavt.gif[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zxz9ck.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/25rfqlg.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2wf4ug7.gif[/img]
